column9: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2021
column14: I'm not sure if this product is a fake (not really Aveeno) or if it's mislabeled as hypoallergenic? But either way, my husband and I have had 2 allergic reactions each to this product. Full body itchiness and patches of bumps so over-the-top itchy that we find super swollen welts in areas from scratching so hard and not even realizing it. Benadryl helps some, but not completely. Takes days to go away, even when we change our soap. Would not recommend this to people with allergies or sensitive skin. And it had to be this specific product causing the reaction because it is the only new product either of us have used.
